name: TubEntertain
author: Ade Owolabi-TubEntertain

sections.description:
TubEntertain Is a Powerful wordpress Plugin That Let You Create a Video Gallery of Your YouTube Videos and Live Stream in your WordPress or Other Website, Alongside With Your Social Media, It Is Very Simple, Yet Dynamic.
TubEntertain Is A Full Responsive Video Player Plugin for wordpress.

If you have trouble getting the plugin working. Download the Pro Copy Here.

Youtube Api V3 and Twitter Api V1.1 Compliance

For further customization please contact entertainer@tubentertain.com

Link to ONDEMAND DEMO PAGE.

Link to LIVE STREAM DEMO PAGE.

Features

Go beyound advert blockers & maximize revenue.

Play advert each time video change without blockage.

AutoPlay your alternative YouTube Video when your YouTube Live Stream is offline.

AutoSwitch to your YouTube Live Stream when you are Broadcasting.

Live Stream RealTime Viewers Counter

Fast way to convert YouTube video to HTML5 video.

Auto Create Post and Category , post to WordPress , Twitter and FaceBook in one click or On video play.

Visit The Plugin Page.
sections.installation: Visit The Plugin Page.
sections.faq: A question that someone might have, should be email to entertainer@tubentertain.com, best you can follow the blog on http://tubentertain.com/.
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Add more option to plugin setting.
  • few Css amendmens.

0.1

upgrade_notice.0.2: With upgraded copy you can do more such as create video categories, e.g Misic | Movies | Comedy and create playlist accordingly.
